title: Sooryavanshi
writer: Sanchit Bedre, Vidhi Ghodgaonkar, Yunus Sajawal
short_cast: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Abhimanyu Singh, Gulshan Grover, Kumud Mishra, Jackie Shroff, Jaaved Jaaferi, Mrunal Jain
cast: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Abhimanyu Singh, Gulshan Grover, Kumud Mishra, Jackie Shroff, Jaaved Jaaferi, Mrunal Jain

desc: A fearless, faithful (and only slightly forgetful) Mumbai cop pulls out all the stops — and stunts — to thwart a major conspiracy to attack his city.
